abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the project is to support
            a two-year ARDC program of lending to farmers and an
            intensive training effort primarily for the staff of land
            development banks (LDB). Lending under the project would be
            mainly for minor irrigation, but credit for development of
            other on-farm activities such as dairying, poultry raising,
            and sericulture would be provided.
